channel.title: Posts on Chris Turner

item.title: Two Programming Languages Walk Into A Bar ...
item.description: Two Programming Lanugages Walk Into A Bar 0. Introduction Two programming languages walk into The Computation, a new bar in town. Python, a smooth, popular language struts in and nods to the scholars and professionals. They swoon over discussions about everything from machine learning to web development. With a slight delay, R nonchalantly walks in over to its usual spot- next to the Academics and statisticians- surrounded by premade pacakges and libraries.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.
